title: The Nine Grahas - Planetary Forces
description: In Vedic astrology, grahas are not just physical planets but karmic forces

planets.name: Sun (Surya)
planets.represents: Soul, father, authority, government, ego, vitality
planets.bhrigu_teaching: The Sun reveals your soul's purpose. A strong Sun gives leadership and self-confidence. Honor your father and authorities to strengthen Sun.

planets.name: Moon (Chandra)
planets.represents: Mind, mother, emotions, public, comfort, nurturing
planets.bhrigu_teaching: The Moon governs your mind and emotions. A strong Moon gives mental peace and emotional stability. Honor your mother to strengthen Moon.

planets.name: Mars (Mangala)
planets.represents: Energy, courage, siblings, property, sports, anger
planets.bhrigu_teaching: Mars gives warrior spirit and courage. Channel this energy through exercise, sports, or service. Control anger through discipline.

planets.name: Mercury (Budha)
planets.positive_traits: Intelligence, wit, communication skill, business acumen
planets.bhrigu_teaching: Mercury rules the intellect. A strong Mercury gives sharp mind and communication skills. Study scriptures to elevate Mercury.

planets.name: Jupiter (Guru)
planets.represents: Wisdom, teacher, children, fortune, dharma, expansion
planets.bhrigu_teaching: Jupiter is the great benefic, bringing wisdom and fortune. Respect teachers and elders. Study philosophy to strengthen Jupiter.

planets.name: Venus (Shukra)
planets.represents: Love, beauty, luxury, arts, marriage, pleasure
planets.positive_traits: Artistic talent, charm, diplomacy, refined taste
planets.bhrigu_teaching: Venus brings beauty and harmony. A strong Venus gives artistic talents and happy marriage. Practice moderation in pleasures.

planets.name: Saturn (Shani)
planets.represents: Karma, discipline, delays, servants, sorrow, longevity
planets.positive_traits: Discipline, patience, hard work, justice, longevity
planets.bhrigu_teaching: Saturn is the great teacher through discipline. Accept delays as lessons. Serve the poor and elderly to appease Saturn.

planets.name: Rahu (North Node)
planets.represents: Desires, illusion, foreign lands, sudden events, materialism
planets.positive_traits: Ambition, innovation, foreign success, unique perspective
planets.bhrigu_teaching: Rahu creates intense desires and illusions. It can give sudden rise or confusion. Practice meditation to calm Rahu's restless energy.

planets.name: Ketu (South Node)
planets.represents: Spirituality, detachment, past lives, liberation, mysticism
planets.negative_traits: Confusion, isolation, sudden losses, lack of clarity
planets.bhrigu_teaching: Ketu brings spiritual liberation through detachment. It shows past life karma. Embrace spirituality to work with Ketu positively.
